name: Digiteal Payments
author: Digiteal

sections.description:
Accept global and local payment methods, reduce drop-offs and save money on transaction fees.

Why use Digiteal?

  • Payment methods adapted to all your customers: Offer a comprehensive selection of global and local payment methods, including VISA, Mastercard, Bancontact/Payconiq, iDEAL, and more.

  • Competitive and appealing pricing: Our prices are determined based on your monthly transaction volume, ensuring an excellent price-performance ratio. Get started now with no setup fees or monthly fees!

  • Receive funds quickly: Receive money in your IBAN account within 2 to 7 days, depending on the payment method (debit card, credit card, etc.).

  • Orders triggered after payment: Product orders are initiated only after payment has been verified and confirmed.

  • Quick and easy integration: Install the Digiteal Payments module for WooCommerce, follow the setup process, confirm your Digiteal account, and you’re ready to go!

  • Personalized customer support: Need help? Enjoy the support of a flexible and dedicated team located in Belgium. We are with you every step of the way.

Find all your transactions in your dashboard

Digiteal Payments for WooCommerce provides you with convenient access to all your transactions, enabling easy monitoring of cash flow and resolution of disputes directly from your store’s dashboard.

Save hours in your accounting tasks

Accounting is not your biggest passion? That’s fine: Digiteal Payments for WooCommerce is designed to save you precious time. The amount paid by your client is transferred to your business bank account to the penny, for perfect accounting traceability and reconciliation. No commission related to the transaction is deducted from the payment.

5-star customer service

Do you have a question or need assistance to take full advantage of the Digiteal Payments for WooCommerce module? Our Belgium-based customer service supports you every step of the way to give your customers the best payment experience.

How to get started?

  1. Create your Digiteal business account

  2. Download, install and activate Digiteal Payments extension

  3. Contact Digiteal to enable the payment methods of your choice, and off you go!
sections.installation:
1. Install the plugin
  2. Activate it
  3. Go to \”WooCommerce\” –> \”Digiteal Payments settings\” in admin menu
  4. Enter your Digiteal credentials and login
  5. If you want, you can enter your IBAN number (not required as leaving this blank will use the one set in your Digiteal account)
